t: What is AWS Secrets Manager? - AWS Secrets Manager
s: Secrets Manager helps you improve your security posture, because you no longer need hard-coded credentials in application source code. Storing the credentials in Secrets Manager helps avoid possible compromise by anyone who can inspect your application or the components.

t: Pricing | AWS Secrets Manager | Amazon Web Services (AWS)
s: AWS Secrets Manager enables you to rotate, manage, and retrieve secrets throughout their lifecycle, making it easier to maintain a secure environment that meets your security and compliance needs. With Secrets Manager, you pay based on the number of secrets stored and API calls made.
